originalText.text: No matter your level of preparation, at Ballet Arts you will not only find the best teachers, from absolute beginner classes to professional ones, but also a great, supportive and inspiring community! Plus Stephen, the owner, is a sweetheart! This place is my happy place in NY ‚ù§

originalText.text: Some of my very best times in New York have been with Stephen Reed at Ballet Arts. The studio is absolutely enormous and the classes I take are nothing short of pure joy!!! I cannot rate this highly enough. I‚Äôd give it 100 stars if I could!

originalText.text: I have heard good things, before going. My first time at this studio and it was truly wonderful. So clean and beautiful. It was a small class and the teacher was excellent. I‚Äôm so happy I finally tried Ballet Arts.
